class_notes:
(Same as ENVS 446 900)
Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from June 10 - July 7, 2023. Apply online at studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: This summer field course will provide students with a hands-on experience in the southern African countries of Namibia and Botswana. Within a conservation biology perspective, students have the opportunity to learn about the unique habitats and conservation issues of southern Africa.
sections: Class Nbr: 2241, Section #: 900, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: L. Wilson, Status: Open
